title: Baewatch: Parental Guidance
overview: Self-styled 'perfect' couples put their relationships to the test on a romantic getaway in the sun. What they don't realise is that secretly doing the testing are their own families.In each episode a pair of unsuspecting lovebirds are secretly watched, tested and judged by mums, dads, grandparents and siblings who want to find out the truth about their loved one's relationship.After 48 hours the family members must come clean and share what they now really think of the couple - but not before making them watch back every last embarrassing detail of their holiday romance.
